servicesPage.title: Our Services
servicesPage.subtitle: Comprehensive data solutions tailored to your business needs. From strategy to implementation, we help you unlock the full potential of your data.

services.title: Data Strategy
services.description: We help you define a clear roadmap to turn your data into a competitive advantage. Our strategic approach ensures that your data initiatives align with your business goals.

services.title: Analytics Engineering
services.description: Build a robust, scalable data foundation. We design and implement modern data stacks that deliver clean, reliable data to your stakeholders.

services.title: Cloud Migration
services.description: Move your legacy systems to the cloud with confidence. We handle the complex process of migration while optimizing for cost and performance.

services.title: Actionable AI & ML
services.description: Deploy predictive models that directly impact the bottom line. Turn data into decisions with our AI and machine learning expertise.

servicesPage.ctaTitle: Ready to transform your data strategy?

caseStudiesPage.title: Case Studies
caseStudiesPage.subtitle: Real results from our partnership with forward-thinking companies.

cases.title: Scaling data infrastructure for a global bank
cases.summary: How we reduced query times by 40% and improved data reliability across 12 countries by migrating to a modern cloud data warehouse.

cases.title: Predictive analytics for retail inventory
cases.summary: Implementing machine learning models to predict stock shortages and optimize supply chain for a major retail chain.

cases.title: Automated compliance for healthcare data
cases.summary: Building a secure, automated framework to ensure HIPAA compliance while enabling research teams to access anonymized data.

aboutPage.title: About Keskess Consulting
aboutPage.subtitle: We are a team of data engineers, strategists, and analysts dedicated to helping businesses make better decisions.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize access to high-quality data insights. We believe that every company, regardless of size, deserves world-class data infrastructure.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where data is not a bottleneck, but an accelerator. We envision a future where business leaders can ask questions and get answers instantly.

items.title: Transparency
items.description: We believe in open communication and clear data.

items.title: Excellence
items.description: We don't settle for 'good enough'. We build for scale.

items.title: Curiosity
items.description: We ask the hard questions to find the right answers.

items.title: Impact
items.description: We focus on work that drives real business results.

serviceDetails.readySubtitle: Let's discuss how {service} can help your business transform and grow.

strategy.title: Data Strategy
strategy.description: We help you define a clear roadmap to turn your data into a competitive advantage. Our strategic approach ensures that your data initiatives align with your business goals.
benefits: Data Maturity Assessment: Understand where you stand and where you need to go.
Roadmap Development: A step-by-step plan to achieve your data goals.
Governance Frameworks: Ensure data quality, security, and compliance.
ROI Analysis: Measure the business impact of your data investments.

engineering.title: Analytics Engineering
engineering.description: Build a robust, scalable data foundation. We design and implement modern data stacks that deliver clean, reliable data to your stakeholders.
benefits: Data Modeling (dbt): Transform raw data into business logic.
Pipeline Orchestration: Automate your data workflows.
Data Warehouse Architecture: Optimized for performance and cost.
Quality Assurance: Automated testing for data reliability.

cloud.title: Cloud Migration
cloud.description: Move your legacy systems to the cloud with confidence. We handle the complex process of migration while optimizing for cost and performance.
benefits: Legacy to Cloud: Seamless transition strategies.
Cost Optimization: Pay only for what you use.

ai.title: Actionable AI & ML
ai.description: Deploy predictive models that directly impact the bottom line. Turn data into decisions.
benefits: Predictive Modeling: Forecast trends and behaviors.
Natural Language Processing: Unlock insights from text.
MLOps: Deploy and maintain models in production.
